00044 //:  Examiner viewer tableau for 3D scenes
00045 class bgui3d_examiner_tableau : public bgui3d_fullviewer_tableau
00046 {
00047  public:
00048   enum SeekDistance
00049   {
00050     SEEK_FAR,
00051     SEEK_HALF,
00052     SEEK_NEAR,
00053     SEEK_ZERO
00054   };
00055 
00056   //: Constructor
00057   bgui3d_examiner_tableau(SoNode * scene_root = NULL);
00058 
00059   //: Destructor
00060   virtual ~bgui3d_examiner_tableau();
00061 
00062   //: Handle vgui events
00063   virtual bool handle(const vgui_event& event);
00064 
00065   //: Return the type name of this tableau
00066   vcl_string type_name() const;
00067 
00068   //: Builds a popup menu
00069   virtual void get_popup(const vgui_popup_params&, vgui_menu &m);
00070 
00071   //: Render the scene graph (called on draw events)
00072   virtual bool render();
00073 
00074   //: Pans the camera
00075   void pan(const SbVec2f & currpos, const SbVec2f & prevpos, const float aspect_ratio);
00076 
00077   //: Zooms the camera
00078   void zoom( float aspectratio );
00079 
00080   //: Spins the camera around the scene
00081   void spin(const SbVec2f& currpos, const SbVec2f &prevpos);
00082 
00083   //: Reorients the camera to the specified rotation
00084   void reorient_camera(const SbRotation & rot);
00085 
00086   //: Updates position log
00087   void update_log(SbVec2f pos);
00088 
00089   //: Resets position log
00090   void reset_log();
00091 
00092   //: Seeks for the object under a mouse click and zooms to it
00093   void seek_to_point(SbVec2s pos);
00094 
00095   //: What to do if events are idle, if enabled
00096   bool idle();
00097 
00098   //: Set the visibility of the axis cross
00099   void set_axis_visible(bool state);
00100 
00101   //: Return true if the axis cross is visible
00102   bool axis_visible() const;
00103 
00104   void set_seek_distance( SeekDistance seek );
00105 
00106   //void seeksensorCB(void * data, SoSensor * s);
00107

00110   // can access them
